column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had a few people recommend Lou Malnati's to us prior to our trip so decided to check it out. We got the bruschetta and the Malnati Deep Dish
column2: which were both good but nothing outstanding. The service was pretty slow and the waitress also never brought my soup (they took it off the check after I mentioned it to them). Overall I really thought this place was just "ok".
